scripts.start: npm run _rust:core:build:dev && npm run _rust:renderer:build:dev && npm run _rust:audio:build:dev && npm-run-all -p _webpack:start _rust:core:start _rust:renderer:start _rust:audio:start
scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist && npm run _rust:core:clean && npm run _rust:renderer:clean && npm run _rust:audio:clean
scripts.bundle:ci: npm run clean && npm run _rust:core:package:release && npm run _rust:renderer:package:release && npm run _rust:audio:package:release && npm run _webpack:build
scripts._rust:renderer:build:dev: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-A warnings" cargo +nightly build --features dev --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path ./src/crates/renderer/Cargo.toml
scripts._rust:renderer:package:release: npm run _rust:renderer:build:release && npm run _rust:renderer:bindgen:release && npm run _rust:renderer:opt
scripts._rust:renderer:build:release: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-A warnings" cargo +nightly build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path ./src/crates/renderer/Cargo.toml
scripts._rust:audio:build:dev: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-A warnings" cargo +nightly build --features dev --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path ./src/crates/audio/Cargo.toml
scripts._rust:audio:package:release: npm run _rust:audio:build:release && npm run _rust:audio:bindgen:release && npm run _rust:audio:opt
scripts._rust:audio:build:release: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-A warnings" cargo +nightly build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path ./src/crates/audio/Cargo.toml
scripts._rust:core:build:dev: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-A warnings" cargo +nightly build --features dev --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path ./src/crates/core/Cargo.toml
scripts._rust:core:package:release: npm run _rust:core:build:release && npm run _rust:core:bindgen:release && npm run _rust:core:opt
scripts._rust:core:build:release: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-A warnings" cargo +nightly build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --manifest-path ./src/crates/core/Cargo.toml
